title: Gunther flies to Las Vegas on Friends plane without a phalange
text:
We wouldn’t trust a plane with no phalange… (Picture: @friends, Getty)

James Michael Tyler – who you’ll know as Gunther from Friends – has flown in to Las Vegas to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the show… but it turns out his plane had no phalange.

He shared a photo of the personalised Friends-branded jet on Instagram, telling his followers: ‘Took “Air Friends”, flight #25 to #Vegas baby!’

However, what he didn’t say in his post was that he was taking his life into his hands by flying on a plane that was missing a vital part.

The Friends Instagram account confirmed: ‘”This plane doesn’t even have a phalange”, but thankfully updated followers that they had landed without the vital part.

If you’re not sure what the phalange is or does… well, you’d better go back and rewatch the whole of Friends.

In the final episode of the show, The Last One, Phoebe Buffay phones Rachel Green, who has boarded a plane to Paris, to try and get her off the flight by telling her there’s a problem with the ‘left phalange’.

The Friends account confirmed there was no phalange on the plane (Picture: @friends)

It was touch and go but they made it… (Picture: Instagram)

When other passengers overhear, panic ensues, and all of the passengers are required to change planes while the fictitious left phalange is fixed.

Advertisement

Advertisement

This eventually leads to Rachel’s iconic ‘I got off the plane’ line, as she turns down her new job and life in Paris to stay in New York with Ross Geller.

The Friends cast are celebrating 25 years of the hit show, and Jennifer Aniston thrilled fans this week when she posted her first Instagram picture, which was a shot of the whole cast reunited.

Fans have been calling for a reunion episode or series of the show since the day it ended, but the cast have yet to all agree on a reboot of the series.

We’re not giving up hope though – even if some of them are risking their lives by flying in phalange-less planes…

description: James Michael Tyler aka Gunther from Friends revealed he was flying to Las Vegas on a personalised plane with no left phalange.
